title: Homeopathic Medicines for Fatigue
cleaned_text:
Fatigue is a widespread condition experienced by many people. It is the condition where a person feels tired and weak after any exertion or being overworked. Debility and weakness are the primary symptoms of fatigue, while its causes include lack of restful sleep, improper rest, anemia, grief, depression or excessive physical work. Fatigue is usually accompanied by headaches, muscle aches, and drowsiness. The fatigued person is unable to work properly and lacks energy. Weak memory and lack of concentration are also associated with fatigue. Homeopathic medicines for fatigue help provide relief from the symptoms of fatigue and also help treat the condition on a long-term basis.

Homeopathy as a Natural and Alternative Treatment for Fatigue

Homeopathy is an effective alternative treatment for fatigue. Internal homeopathic medicine often proves to be the best natural option to help treat such conditions. These medicines work by treating the whole patient, and not just the symptoms since the human body is one unit, and a disorder in one part can affect another. Homeopathic medicines do not cause drug-dependency or any side-effects.

Kali Phosphoricum – For Fatigue by Exertion.

 Kali Phosporicum is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue caused by the slightest physical labor or mental exertion.

Sarcolacticum Acidum – For Fatigue with Muscle Weakness.

 Sarcolacticum Acidum is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue where there is muscular prostration (extreme weakness), and the slightest exertion leads to muscular weakness with shortness of breath.

Arsenic Album – For Fatigue with Restlessness.

 Arsenic Album is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue with a lot of weakness and restlessness caused by the slightest exertion.

Homeopathic Medicines for Fatigue Due to Depression or Grief

Ignatia – For Fatigue due to Grief.

 Ignatia is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue due to long-lasting grief or depression. Sad, changeable mood along with fatigue is a typical symptom indicative of this medicine.

Phosphoricum Acidum – For Fatigue with Mental Debility.

 Phosphoricum Acidum is a homeopathic medicine used to treat conditions of fatigue marked with mental incapacity. The person is apathetic and indifferent due to the adverse effects of grief and depression.

Gelsemium – For Fatigue on Slight Exertion.

 Gelsemium is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue and muscular weakness caused by the slightest exertion. Lack of muscular coordination with trembling and excessive weakness of all limbs, and general drowsiness and dullness are indicative of this medicine.

Arnica – For Fatigue with Soreness.

 Arnica is a homeopathic medicine used to treat soreness caused by over-exertion. A sore, lame and bruised feeling in the limbs is present along with an inability to perform continuous active work.

Homeopathic Medicines for Fatigue with Dizziness and Drowsiness

Opium – For Fatigue with Sleepiness.

 Opium is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue where there is a condition of drowsiness and stupor.

Gelsemium – For Fatigue with Dullness.

 Gelsemium is a homeopathic medicine used to treat dizziness, drowsiness, and dullness along with weakness in all limbs and a desire to be quiet and isolated.

China – For Fatigue with Flushed Face.

 China is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue in an anemic person who suffers physical weakness and has a flushed face due to loss of fluids.

Ferrum Metallicum – For Fatigue with Sensitivity.

 Ferrum metallicum is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue in anemic people who experience oversensitivity to cold and have cold extremities. Weakness may occur from the slightest walking or talking.

Homeopathic medicines for Fatigue due to Lack of Sleep

Aurum Metallicum – For Fatigue with Morning Weakness.

 Aurum metallicum is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue along with weakness in the morning. The person feels weary, but cannot rest or sleep properly.

Cocculus Indicus – For Fatigue with Constant Drowsiness.

 Cocculus Indicus is a homeopathic medicine used to treat constant drowsiness and fatigue caused by lack of sleep, being awake at night and nursing.

Homeopathic Medicine for Fatigue with Weak Memory and Concentration

Picricum Acidum – For Mental Weakness.

 Picricum Acidum is a homeopathic medicine used to treat mental weakness that occurs as a result of light reading or writing. This medicine is helpful in handling cases where the person is unable to exert the mind by talking, thinking, collecting thoughts or studying.

China – For Fatigue with Inability to Think.

 China is a homeopathic medicine used to treat extreme physical weakness and congestive headache. Dullness and confusion with an inability to think are indicative of China.

Natrum Muriaticum – For Fatigue with Bursting Headache.

 Natrum Muriaticum is a homeopathic medicine used to treat fatigue with bursting headache caused due to eyestrain. Nervous, discouraged people experiencing such problems are suitable candidates for this medicine.
